content: भर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भृ-अप्] Bearing, granting, supporting, &c. (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). --रः {@--1@} A burden, load, weight; खुरत्रये भरं कृत्वा <ls>Pt. 1</ls> ‘supporting himself on his three hoofs’; फलभरपरिणामश्यामजंबू &c. <ls>U. 2. 20</ls>; भरव्यथा <ls>Mu. 2. 18.</ls> {@--2@} A great number, large quantity, collection, multitude; धत्ते भरं कुसुमपत्रफलावलीनां <ls>Bv. 1. 94</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">54</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 47.</ls> {@--3@} Bulk, mass. {@--4@} Excess; निर्व्यूढसौहृदभरेति गुणोज्ज्वलोति <ls>Māl. 6. 17</ls>; शोमाभरैः संभृताः <ls>Bv. 1. 103</ls>; कोपभरेण <ls>Gīt. 3.</ls> {@--5@} A particular measure of weight. {@--6@} Theft, taking away. {@--7@} Attacking, a battle (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--8@} A hymn or song of praise.
